txt.en: Defeat Haradrim Marksmen at Lân Mefam ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Lân Mefam is located east of Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should defeat Haradrim Marksmen at Lân Mefam.
A number of Haradrim Marksmen gather at Lân Mefam and should be dealt with.
You have defeated many Haradrim at Lân Mefam and have struck a blow to the Haradrim forces in the South.
Lân Mefam is located east of Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should defeat Haradrim Marksmen at Lân Mefam.

You see there are a number of Haradrim Marksmen gathered at Lân Mefam. They seem to be resting before riding Mûmakil off to war. Defeating them should lessen the number of archers firing from atop those giant beasts.
Defeat Haradrim Marksmen at Lân Mefam
